Name: Too Close For Comfort
Ingredients: 30 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Sweet and sour with the distinctive flavour of Southern Comfort.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Mezza9, Singapore.
Nutrition: One serving of Too Close For Comfort contains 227 calories
